org.activebpel.rt.xml.schema
Class AeSchemaDuration

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.xml.schema.AeAbstractPatternBasedSchemaType
      org.activebpel.rt.xml.schema.AeSchemaDuration
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeSchemaType
public class AeSchemaDuration
extends AeAbstractPatternBasedSchemaType

This class represents a schema duration (xs:duration). A duration exists as a number of years, months, days, hours, minutes, and seconds in the format...

PnYnMnDTnHnMnS
...where n is some integer.

extractInt

protected int extractInt(java.lang.String aString)
Extracts the integer portion of a component of the duration.

Parameters:
aString -

extractSeconds

protected int extractSeconds(java.lang.String aString)
Extracts the seconds from group 7 of the regular expression match. This match could be simply 'nS' in which case n will be returned, or it could be 'n1.n2S' in which case n1 will be returned.

Parameters:
aString -

extractMillis

protected int extractMillis(java.lang.String aString)
Extracts the millis information from group 7 of the regular expression match.

Parameters:
aString -
